subject: New to junit please help
msgSnippet: hai iam mans iam new to Junit, i know java but i do not know much about junit Now in my company thay have to implement junit hence they asked me implement it,
messageBody:
hai iam mans

iam new to Junit, i know java but i do not know
much about junit
Now in my company thay have to implement junit
hence they asked me implement it, but as iam new i
need u all help, i have some basic question in which
iam wil wait for u all reply

1) Why Junit framework should be written because as
the developers many time is given for coding and junit
takes much time.
2) what junit is doing? it compares the expected with
actual but this can be done manualy( since each
developer will be doing this in its development
routine) as testing point of view in whitebox testing
there is some testing a)Condition testing b)loop
testing c) decision testing . How van above can be
implemented By using Junit.
3) When i have to get input from the konsole, where i
can write the coding whether in source code or in
junit framework because i write thecoding to get input
in source code then i again have to repeat the same
coding in the framwork becaust to compare the value
[iam little bit confused here]
3) I do a Junit framework Now i connected that to
sourc code, the result of sourc code can be obtained
but how can i compare with that using assert ? that is
whether i have to write another source code in the
framwork and compare the result with the source code
result. In examples like fibinnaci iam able ot chack
only for null and i cannot chack for assert equals
because it cannot ale to give the relut value becuse
it is dynamically displaying, how can i do i need the
reply
Thank u
C.A.mans
